description.long: 7+ years of experience in technology. I have touched every part of the software development life cycle, from design to deployment and maintenance, focusing on the product and paying attention to the human team.
description.short: BackEnd specialist, FrontEnd friend and DevOps enthusiast

company.name: Linio MX (Latam)
company.description: Linio is an e-commerce platform part of Falabella Group, the largest retail company in Latin America.

job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: I am part of the Linio Payments and Checkout team, we are responsible for the payment methods and the checkout process of the Linio platform. We work under PCI-DSS standard and with a high volume of transactions, ensuring the security of customer data and the availability of services within a complex flow.

lasProject.title: Implement a new wallet payment method - Mastercard Click to Pay
